section.title: Usage of deployment style sheet
section.para: With deployment style sheet mechanism, it is possible to apply optimizations annotations on specific entities without intrusion in the ADL code.
The advantage is that the deployment context is clearly separated from the logical architecture description (the ADL files are not modified).
To apply an extension file, the --ext-file or -E option must be used with the mindc command line.

Refer to the deployment style sheet documentation plugin for further details about this mechanism.
Deployment style sheet documentation not yet available, to be written and integrated in Mindc and plugins User Guide.
The syntax in the extension file to set annotations is the following :
<package>, <component name> and <instance name ...> can be replaced by '*' if the annotation has to applied to all packages and/or all components.
